methods.appendTable:
Append a new table at the end of this union with the given maxKey. It is expected that tables will be added in
 tableId order.

:param maxKey: (long) - the maximum key of the table
methods.computeShiftIfNeeded:
Computes any shift that should be applied to future tables.

:param tableId: (int) - the table id of the table that might need more space
:param maxKey: (long) - the max key for the table with tableId
:return: (long) the relative shift to be applied to all tables with greater tableIds

text:
This class manages the constituent Tables for a UnionColumnSource, so that we can map from an outer (merged) index
 into the appropriate segment of a component table.
